string-array.item: The Summary tab displays a quick glance of a player\'s win percentage for public and ranked games. It also contains a list of all known matches for this player.
The Favorites tab uses both Public and Ranked matches in its calculations.
The Success tab uses both Public and Ranked matches in its calculations and only considers heroes that have been played in at least 1% of matches.
The Ranked and Public tabs have many more statistics than the Summary tab. Only games that lasted more than five minutes are used in any statistics calculations!
The Other tab contains statistics for all matches not used in the Public and Ranked tabs. This includes matches that were excluded because they are less than five minutes long.
The All Heroes tab displays a list of all heroes you have played in any Public or Ranked match.
KDA represents the player\'s average Kills, Deaths, and Assists per game.
K/D represents the player\'s average number of Kills divided by the average number of Deaths per game.
K+A/D represents the player\'s average number of Kills and Assists divided by the average number of Deaths per game.
The score values below are experimental. They are intended to give insight into different aspects of a player\'s match history.
The CS Score represents the average combined CS (last hits + denies) of all ten players in each game.
The Teamwork Score is the average number of people involved in each kill on the player\'s team.
